info.hidden: Page is not shown in Navigation Menu.
info.isDynamic: Page is now a Dynamic Page

ur_page.tip:
Dynamic Page creates pseudo pages in Unified-RED to simplify creating pages with identical groups, tabs, & widgets. A Dynamic page requires:
  • Instance Name Expression: must include {x}.
  • Instances: the lists of instance names and numbers must match in length. (names refer to displayed name; number refers to reference number
